message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. It's worth more than $150 to me, reflecting its high quality and unique features. I'm confident it will provide significant value to you as well. Let's discuss a fair price that reflects both its worth and your needs. My initial offer is $200. Looking forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product's quality, $200 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay at this time. I'm interested in purchasing, but would need a price closer to $150 to make it work for me.  Let's find a price that's fair for both of us.
